items.title: American Express (NYSE:AXP) Share Price Falls 12% in a Week Amid Shareholder Proposals
items.description: American Express (NYSE:AXP) recently faced a series of shareholder proposals focusing on its Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion policies and executive compensation guidelines. These internal pressures coincided with external market volatility driven by global tariffs, leading the company's share price to decline by 12% last week. The broader market, including the Dow and S&P 500, experienced steep declines amid trade tensions, with the Dow dropping over 5% and the S&P 500 falling by 6% in the...

items.title: 3 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
items.description: When in doubt about your next best bet, consider poaching an idea (or three) from the world's most proven stock picker.

items.title: 5 Reasons to Buy American Express Stock Like There's No Tomorrow
items.description: The credit card and banking giant is still an evergreen investment.

items.title: 2 Warren Buffett Stocks to Hold Forever
items.description: Warren Buffett is known for saying his favorite holding period is "forever."  In fact, it's been a net seller of stocks for the past nine quarters, a rarity for the holding company.  Throughout this time, there are two stocks (among others) he hasn't touched that he has said several times he would never sell: Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) and American Express (NYSE: AXP).
